name: Chandelure
description: This Pokémon haunts dilapidated mansions. It sways its arms to hypnotize opponents with the ominous dancing of its flames.

abilities.name: Protective Glow
abilities.effect: All of your Pokémon that have Energy attached have no Weakness.

attacks.name: Mirage Flare
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Confused.
